title: With an application for development permission, where an owner seeks utilization of DRC, he shall submit the DRC to the Authority who shall endorse thereon in writing in figures and words, the quantum of the TDR proposed to be utilised, before granting development permission
clause_text: With an application for development permission, where an owner seeks utilization of DRC, he shall submit the DRC to the Authority who shall endorse thereon in writing in figures and words, the quantum of the TDR proposed to be utilised, before granting development permission.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: With an application for development permission, where an owner seeks utilization of DRC, he shall submit the DRC to the Authority who shall endorse thereon in writing in figures and words, the quantum
